assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en:
RENOVATION PRACTICE
Practicing reinforces the content of Renovation and restoration I.
Practice is carried out at an older building in need of restoration. Analysis of the current situation. Comparison of interference methods. Completing the renovation work.
Students keep a practice diary during the work period according to the regulations provided by the Native Construction practice guidelines (https://www.is.ut.ee/pls/ois_sso/tere.tulemast?viit=2120006) and submit a proper written practice report.
description.et:
RENOVEERIMISPRAKTIKA
Harjutades kinnistatakse aine Renoveerimine ja restaureerimine I sisu.
Praktika viiakse läbi taastamist vajaval vanema hoone juures. Olemasoleva olukorra analüüs. Sekkumismeetmete võrdlus. Taastamistööde teostamine.
Üliõpilane peab tööperioodil praktikapäevikut vastavalt RE praktikajuhendis (https://www.is.ut.ee/pls/ois_sso/tere.tulemast?viit=2120006) määratletud korrale ning esitab korrakohase kirjaliku praktikaaruande.

objectives.en: Acquire basic skills for restoring log constructions, reinforce and test the knowledge acquired within the course Renovation and restoration.
objectives.et: Omandada palgist konstruktsiooni taastamise põhioskused, kinnistada ja testida aine Renoveerimine ja restaureerimine I raames omandatud teadmisi.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of the course students:
- can estimate the reasons for damage to log structure, and make suggestions about interference methods;
learning_outcomes.et: - suudab hinnata palkkonstruktsiooni kahjustuste põhjusi ja teha ettepanekuid sekkumismeetme kohta;

learning_outcomes.en: - can participate in log building restoration work, being independently responsible for their line of work;
learning_outcomes.et: - suudab osaleda palkehitise taastamistöödel, vastutades iseseisvalt oma töölõigu eest;

learning_outcomes.en: - acquire readiness to communicate with the commissioner and consider the specific features of the order and object.
learning_outcomes.et: - omandab valmiduse suhelda tellijaga ning arvestada objekti ja tellimuse spetsiifikaga.
